Uses of Package
xtc.lang.cpp

Packages that use xtc.lang.cpp
xtc.lang.cpp This package implements the SuperC parsing engine for parsing all of C. 
 

Classes in xtc.lang.cpp used by xtc.lang.cpp
Actions
          Support for semantic actions and parser context.
Actions.Context
          The context interface.
Actions.ValueType
          The types of semantic values.
CActionsBase
          This class is generated from grammar annotations and provides semantic value and action support.
CParsingContext
          This class implements the generated CActionsBase class.
CParsingContext.trit
          A three-bit digit.
CTag
           
ForkMergeParser.Lookahead
          A lookahead token.
ForkMergeParser.OrderedSyntax
          A syntax object and it's sequence number, buffered in a linked-list so that multiple subparsers can read tokens from the same stream.
ForkMergeParser.StateStack
          A frame of the parsing state stack.
ForkMergeParser.Subparser
          A subparser.
HeaderFileManager
          This class manages the lexing of input files as well as finding headers.
HeaderFileManager.Include
          This class abstracts away both a single header and computed headers that have to include several headers in different context.
MacroTable
          The conditional macro table.
